Name: Under The Stars
About the game: This is a space themed small casual shooting game, can be used to fill the leisure time. Gameplay: You can control the ship in the game, during the continuous collection of energy consumption, while avoiding or shooting the enemy in front of the shield can defend the enemy's bullets. There are different types of bullets to choose from, each of which has 2 levels, but the cost increases with the strength of the bullet. The fastest and easiest way to beat the game is to master the shield. Can't fly backwards in a game, only fly forwards. Story: Due to the failure of the mission wandering in the abandoned spacecraft in the universe, looking for the final hope of survival, they know that blue planet is in front of... Keyboard: Move: Arrow keys / WASD Shooting: Space Protective cover: E
